website_summaries.verdict: Those looking to save a few dollars while still receiving a relatively well-known product should check out this versatile mat.
pros: Hook-and-loop tape on ends for connecting other mats
cons: Company can be inconsistent with the quality of mats it sends out

customer_reviews.title: This is the mat! Finally!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mat for my 11yo daughter who is constantly doing gymnastics around the house. I was skeptical at first because the picture does it no justice!!! It is a clean, beautiful, Very big, very thick and firm mat.Leathery on both sides. Velcro at ends. I would've paid even more if I knew the quality would be this good! Definitely recommend this to anyone! Also, I ordered it knowing it said it probably wouldn't make it in time for Christmas and said the 28th, it came the 23rd! I was so excited I got to wrap the huge box and give it for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about it at first but after having it awhile, I've realized what a great investment it was for the price. This mat has taken daily abuse for months from an almost 11 yr old competitive gymnast and the dog that insist on sleeping on it and it's held up. It gets folded daily and tossed into other rooms. After having surgery, I've been doing my therapy exercises on it too. I like the 2" foam - thicker than most that are 1.5.
customer_reviews.author: Twin Mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! Very affordable and high quality materials. My daughter got this for her 7th birthday and she really loves it. We expect her to be able to use it for a long time to come.
customer_reviews.author: Marilou

customer_reviews.title: This was a great price for a great mat
customer_reviews.text: This was a great price for a great mat. These can get pretty pricey so was worried about the quality when I saw this wasn't as pricey. My daughter is huge into tumbling and I can tell you this mat is worth every penny. Not a single complaint!
customer_reviews.author: MOMOF3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mat, go with the 10’
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous ordering this big thing online. The color was not appealing in the picture. I was not sure if the firmness or the size is right. But I was totally pleased. It is nice clean blue color. 10’ is perfect for my 11 y/o daughter. The foam has enough support and right amount of softness. When you do a hand stand, you can see the mark but not sink in. The quality is very good and the price is reasonable! Definitely recommend this to anyone! The mat has velcro on the bottom so it’s not slipping on the hardwood floor. The velcro is not sticky to the carpet which’s good. This is a big plus compared to others.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these mats I bought 2 to practice jiujitsu with my kids they work great
customer_reviews.author: Team Grushko

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS ADVERTISED!
customer_reviews.text: I'm upset. The first time I ordered this mat it was great. It was just as advertised and great quality. So, I ordered another mat. The mat I received THIS time is 3 to 4 inches shorter than the first one, and therefore it is NOT 10' and it's a DARK blue, a TOTALLY different color than what is shown. I have contacted the seller and am waiting for a reply.
customer_reviews.author: Monkey's Mama

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This mat was larger than I was expecting, although if I had looked at the measurements I should’ve known better. It is however the perfect size to give an 11-year-old girl who won’t stop jumping around the right amount of space to do walk overs and all the other obnoxious things they won’t stop doing. It does fold up and travel easily, just make sure you have a spot to store it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Would get 0 stars if that was an option. Purchased 2 and they both started ripping at the seams in no time at all. The one was out of the return period (only a couple months of use). And the other I had my kids use it daily so I could see how it was going to hold up. It started ripping at the seams just like the 1st one so I got it returned before my “couple month warranty period” ran up. It was delivered back to them a few days ago and I still haven’t received my refund.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn82

customer_reviews.title: but we were far from disappointed. Instead we were elated to find them of ...
customer_reviews.text: These mats are an unbelievable value! We were concerned that they would be of inferior materials because of cost and also because of the off-name brand, but we were far from disappointed. Instead we were elated to find them of superior quality foam and heavy duty vinyl covering. We use them for jiu jitsu grappling and were so happy with them we ordered a 3rd. I would recommend them to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Jean P White

customer_reviews.title: Large, Durable Gymnastics Mat
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old just started gymnastics and this mat is perfect for her to use when practicing cartwheels and tumbling. It is long enough for her to do a cartwheel without going off the end. It is just the right amount of cushion vs. firm that ensures she does not get hurt if she falls. It folds up easily and has built in carrying handles. The material and sewing are durable and so far have shown no signs of damage. We use it in our living room on a laminate floor and have not had any problems with the mat slipping. There is Velcro in the sides so that you can attach additional mats.
customer_reviews.author: D. Burch

customer_reviews.title: This mat is thick and sturdy. We've had it for over 6 months and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is sprawled across my living room floor about 90% of the time. My daughter uses this daily to practice her tumbling. This mat is thick and sturdy. We've had it for over 6 months and even with daily use, is still in excellent condition. It's great that she can practice her tumbling at home with this. It has helped her improve so much. It is longer than most mats so she has no problems with missing the end of the mat. I love the handles! We just fold it up at night and slide it behind the couch. She loves this thing. This is the best purchase I have ever made!
customer_reviews.author: Fabmom

customer_reviews.title: Great for Self-Defense Class
customer_reviews.text: We bought 4 of these to be used for mobile self-defense training we just started to offer to our Armed2Defend classes. They connect together really well to form a larger mat. The instructor warned to not use shoes on the mat because your shoes will stick to the mat and won't allow you to pivot and you can twist your leg or ankle. This applies to all mats with the plastic/leather surface. They had enough density to allow free good movement. We've only used them once so I can't speak to long term quality.
customer_reviews.author: Paddling Upstream

customer_reviews.title: Great mat for practicing gymnastics
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 10 year old to practice flips and bridges. She just started gymnastics a few months ago so this gives her a safe area to practice at home and gives us something to do on the weekend. Its only long enough to do one maybe two flips but she lands just off the mat. When she gets more advanced this mat will probably be too small but it does have velcro on the side to attach another mat. It seems to be great quality. It's a little firm at first but has softened with use. Shipping was fast and it came wrapped in plastic (which I really appreciated!)
customer_reviews.author: Jacky

customer_reviews.title: Good for house tumblers!
customer_reviews.text: My son is always tumbling all over our house. While he never hurts himself, I can only assume he's going to have bad knees and other joints when he gets older from all of his activity on the hard floors. We bought this mat so he can lay it out and tumble around on it, and it works very well. It folds up nicely, is portable, and provides quite a bit of cushion. We didn't experience much of an odor from this - after a couple hours out of the packaging, we can't smell anything.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marx

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with what you get for the price. 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with what you get for the price. 2 of these connected using the Velcro hold well during MMA practice.
customer_reviews.author: MissMandyRN

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mat! My 9 yr old daughter is beyond ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome mat! My 9 yr old daughter is beyond happy with it fits her perfect and she’s able to practice her gymnastics on it. Mat has a 2” high density (firm) EPE foam. The surface is puncture resistant and non-absorbent PU leather. Has carrying handles and a foldable, 4 panel design for easy storage and transportation. My kiddo stores it in her room and brings it out front when she uses it. The handles help make it possible for her to do it on her own. The ends have velcro straps for attaching to other mats and securing folded shape which is a very nice feature. We will be buying another mat so we can use this feature.
customer_reviews.author: Roxaroos

customer_reviews.title: Quality Mat for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the great quality of this mat. No gaps between the sections and it's firm yet soft. There is velcro on the ends and sides to attach more sections together. Would definitely buy again if we ever need more.
customer_reviews.author: RWarren

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mat!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for a month and my three kids (ages 6, 8, 9) have practically lived on it since we got it. Perfect for gymnastics practice and so much more. Every time I fold it up and put it away the kids just drag it back out so now I leave it out in the family room. Their friends love to play on it too when they come over. Seriously considering buying another and setting them both up in the basement. Great purchase, so happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: LuckyD

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY a mat with staying power and thickness!!!
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY!!! I wanted a mat like this for years but at the time could only buy a cheaper, thinner one. And that was bad when I did high impact aerobics, especially on my knees and the bottoms of my feet. This mat has velcro on the bottom which makes it stick much better to carpeting and hard surfaces so, NO SLIPPING! Yay! And the thickness is perfect for shock absorption! I am actually excited to get back into working out again!!! This is one of the better purchases I made on Amazon and in the future I may order more mats!
customer_reviews.author: H. Romeo

customer_reviews.title: Works well but less than what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Overall the mat is wonderful, I am concerned that it came with the stitching not being tight and the material covering the mat is not pulled tight across the foam as you can see in the video. We just got this and I am concerned with the continued use causing this to wear out easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable for now
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had any issues, but we have been careful due to some of the reviews. We practice BJJ on these mats and have no rips or tears. Based on the reviews, we are careful and handle them gently, but they have shown no signs of tearing - about 6 months in.
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: Takes alot of abuse
customer_reviews.text: Holding up well. Bought two for Jiu-Jitsu. Seems like they'll be alright
customer_reviews.author: JKFamily6

customer_reviews.title: This is my second time purchasing this product I have had no problems with the first one I bought but the second one is not as nice of quality (first mat purchase was the pink and ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased at the beginning of the summer a few uses in the Velcro started to come apart. The material on it is very lose and creates wrinkles on the mat. This is my second time purchasing this product I have had no problems with the first one I bought but the second one is not as nice of quality (first mat purchase was the pink and black one).
customer_reviews.author: Sean F

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and large
customer_reviews.text: We have had this mat for two months now. My daughters play on it in our finished/carpeted basement. I like the velcro on the edges because it clings to the carpet and I don't worry about it slipping around. It is huge and great for their cartwheels, bridges, and handstands. There is NO wear and tear on it yet. (Of course they do not wear shoes on it.) It folds up easily to lean against the wall out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: eak532

customer_reviews.title: Good Value - Daughter Loves it
customer_reviews.text: 9-year-old daughter loves this mat. Uses it daily for tumbling. I like how it folds up. It was a good value so far. She has used it for 6 mos almost daily and there are no tears etc. Sometimes friends use it as a sleep mat when they come over. To me - it's a little to firm for that. Wish it came in a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2sassypants

customer_reviews.title: 3 years and going strong
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a more substantial mat for working out in the garage than a flimsy little yoga mat and I've been really happy about this so far. Minor discoloration so far but the real damage is a small hole from when I dropped 100lb barbell on it once. Some mild floor cleaner removes and grime/debris and it doesn't seem pick up any funky smells.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your yourng gymnast in training
customer_reviews.text: Needed something I could use at home for my young gymnast in training. This one fit the bill. Plenty thick even for my 230lb weight. The folding feature is perfect and my kid has no problem unfolding and folding up and putting away. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: So worth it! Great Mat!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas so she could work on her tumbling skills in hopes of making the Cheerleading squad. I was a bit nervous about spending so much on something so big, online, but was happily surprised to see how durable the mat is. I purchased the largest one, but still wasn't sure it it would be big enough for her. Thank god it is... and it's wide enough & long enough that she could grow & still be able to flip on it. She's happy, so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to fold and put away
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as a Christmas gift for my stepdaughter (9) who is in gymnastics. My daughter (13) also uses it to practice tumbling. I use it for stretching. All the kids use the mat for Just Dance marathons or lounging on the floor to watch TV. Durable, easy to fold and put away. No chemical smell. And my dogs and cats aren't attracted to it to try to chew or claw on it. Great product for exercise enthusiasts and tumblers.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic mat!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8 yr old daughter who had been doing gymnastics for the last 5 years. This mat far exceeded my expectations! I'm 200lbs and have done many cart wheels and kneeled in same spot for a bit with hardly any indication I was there after I got up. The foam holds up fantastic, the exterior feels nice and quite thick. I can see this mat lasting for quite some time!
customer_reviews.author: glxtrix

customer_reviews.title: Products vary with each purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality mat but reordered to get second mat to connect together because it wasn’t large enough. 2nd mat was different and didn’t have the same Velcro strip so didn’t connect which means they slipped apart and did not offer adequate protection. No response from seller or amazon trying to exchange for duplicate mat to previous purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TonyaP

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product. There was no smell and material seems great. The thickness is around 2 inches and is may solid. I feared that it was going to be cheap and squishy or whatever. Well it wasn't and seems that it will definitely take some crashes but absorb at a comfortable expectation.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Very portable matt great big size!
customer_reviews.text: Love this matt, bought for my daughter she can now practice her tumbling at home. It is big enough that she can do front handsprings and back walkovers. She is 11. She likes to take it outside and the way it folds up makes it easier for her to move it in and out of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Cava

customer_reviews.title: Wow what a GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: First off let me say that this may can be expanded by attaching other mats to the Velcro strips on the ends. The quality is more then expected. It is a very firm foam inside that protects from hard falls. The cover is made from strong material that I don't see ripping or wearing out anytime soon. My daughter LOVES this and had not stopped using it since XMAS. Would definitely buy again. I actually will probably buy another to extend to 20ft. Great item of your in the market for a well built and safe mat.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Crotzer

customer_reviews.title: Different product and size than described
customer_reviews.text: We bought the first mat a couple of years ago, we decided to get a second mat now that we have more room and the mat we received is 6 inches shorter and 3 inches narrower. They changed their product and mislead my purchase. Beware of what you get from this seller. There is also a giant logo on the new mat, see the attached picture for difference in length and the logo.
customer_reviews.author: ria

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing we could have purchased for my daughter!!! Perfect for flipping and other gymnastics. I only gave it four stars because the handle to carry it around broke within a month of using it. We only folded it up a few times too. Oh well, it's a great item!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these mats! We bought 3 so we could have enough room to roll on when practicing Jiu-Jitsu! They do Velcro together and are very thick. Will monitor does rips or tears but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Chealsea M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice mat, but the Velcro closures will stop working if you get hair in them.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is very happy with this. It's a good size and the right firmness. The only criticism is that the Velcro closure doesn't work that well, and so it's harder to get it out of the way because it falls open when we try to lean it against the wall. We do have a couple of dogs and their hair has gotten in the Velcro, so it's not really the manufacturer's fault. That's just a limitation to be aware of if you have pets. Some strong snaps might have been nice instead of the Velcro.
customer_reviews.author: BJK

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: When I looked at this on Dec 20, it said it might not be delivered until after Christmas. Santa somehow got it to our home on the 23rd! Huge box, awesome quality mat. Got this for underneath a foldable balance beam since we have hard floors. My 9-yo won’t stay off her hands now :)
customer_reviews.author: Ed from Powhatan, VA

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality mat
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this particular item because of the great reviews. I received the mat today and the stitching doesn’t seem like it’ll hold up for a long time but we shall see.... I love the thickness though and the fact that it doesn’t move when she’s flipping on it. My 4 year old daughter absolutely LOVE tumbling and she fell in love with this map from the time it was delivered so I hope everything works out with it because I can’t imagine having to send this one back to wait on another one. She would be devastated but the small part that is already starting to unravel on the side scares me.
customer_reviews.author: Nakia Abercrombie

customer_reviews.title: Good material, terrible seams
customer_reviews.text: The material actually seems sturdy but the seams are very week. There is no additional strength or stitching at the handles so this handle pulled right out on the second day . I now have 2 split seams on one of & another in the 2nd pad. They require you pay return shipping to fix their problem so I probably won't. Not worth it to me .
customer_reviews.author: Natrix23

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The handles on the mat rip/tear easily. Both were torn and continued to tear within the first 2 weeks of use. Would not recommend this product for the money as the durability is definitely subpar.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Thomas

customer_reviews.title: PVC
customer_reviews.text: This IS made of PVC as stated on product tag. Returning because I thought, based on Q&A here that it was polyurethane which is less toxic. Having trouble getting a required return authorization number from the company but will update if successful. So far, they’re not particularly helpful.
customer_reviews.author: NYCPrime

customer_reviews.title: Loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and the size is perfect for my 10-year-old daughter. She is able to do a front walk-over and a cartwheel on this mat. I love how it has velcro on the sides and bottom to adhere another mat to it.
customer_reviews.author: Zoraida Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality and craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old future Olympian got this for Christmas because I was tired of hearing her hit the hardwood floor. Not only is it saving us a trip to the ER, but it also serves as a great silencer on wood floors. In all seriousness, this thing is a beast. Great craftsmanship, quality materials and a great price to boot. I am looking into some of their other products to keep my ankle biter busy.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa M.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The mat was received on time but the quality is horrible. It probably had 20 holes in it that someone tried to hide by coloring it with a marker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mats.  Very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I bought 3 mats for my son to use for practicing wrestling. Very durable, great cushioning. Pretty lightweight and easy to fold up. Great seller! Awesome customer service! We had an issue with one of the mats, I sent a message to the buyer to inquire about a possible replacement and they replied within an hour, on a holiday! Seller resolved the issue the next day. Definitely recommend product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: JMWil

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat and Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality mat and my 9 year old daughter loves and uses it all the time for gymnastics! I love how light it is and she can bring it from floor to floor as she needs it. The seller also ships very fast, it was delivered within a couple days of my order. With sellers like these, who needs Amazon Prime!!
customer_reviews.author: MarkC

customer_reviews.title: For the price it's great! I wish it was a little more firm
customer_reviews.text: This mat is larger than I thought. I bought it for.my 3 and 6 year old. For the price it's great! I wish it was a little more firm.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well
customer_reviews.text: We bought this two years ago as a Christmas present for a teen dancer/gymnast. She drags this thing outside and to friend's houses. It is getting used about twice a week, sometimes more, sometimes less. While she is ready to upgrade to an air mat, this has served it's purpose providing her a safe landing to practice her moves. It was reasonably priced and has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: saraly

customer_reviews.title: Its a good price and I like that we can get a ...
customer_reviews.text: Gymnast daughter loves this mat. We keep it in the basement. It a little short, but she uses it non-stop. Its a good price and I like that we can get a second one to attach with the velcro. Also packs up to a manageable size.
customer_reviews.author: geemomoney

customer_reviews.title: Love it for jumproping outside
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the money so I can jump rope without hurting my knees on the pavement. Gets a little dirty, but has stood up to a lot of wear. Glad I paid extra for the extra wide and long one :)
customer_reviews.author: soccerstar666

customer_reviews.title: Nice mat as far as thickness and material
customer_reviews.text: Nice mat as far as thickness and material... however mine ripped at seam within a week of very light indoor use! Disappointed Had to return
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Well loved, maybe not durable
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this, but I'm not sure how long it will last. After a month of use it already has a small scratch/hole in the blue coating. However for the price, I am pleased. I bought it as a safety mat next to a bunk bed, and it's become a favorite play spot for wrestling, rolling, sliding, dancing, etc.
customer_reviews.author: SWegener

customer_reviews.title: Great mat for tumbling
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for her birthday last year. It has held up very well, and my sons like to use it too. It's durable and wipes clean easily. Most importantly, it prevents my crazy tumblers from injuring themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great so far but arrived 2 days late
customer_reviews.text: My 11 yo daughter has been wanting one of these so we were going to surprise her for her birthday. Well it arrived 2 days later which was a bummer for her actual birthday but she freaked when it arrived and was so excited. Cushioning seems very good and will give a safe area for some gumnastics fun.
customer_reviews.author: Heat21a

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mat for practice at home
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yr old daughter practices her floor routine, handstands, round offs, etc on these mats. We bought 2. They're light enough to move around and heavy enough to stay in place when she practices. Not as "cushy/soft" as the ones in her gym but they are great for practicing at home. She loves them!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good gymnastic mat. It pretty big but doesn't seem long enough if you want to do more than one trick. Only problem is it ripped after a month of light use - I do own two dogs, they probably are the ones that ripped it. Sewing started to come undone less then 2 months of use, however it's still holding up a year later.
customer_reviews.author: God

customer_reviews.title: Very durable, easy to move upstairs and outside
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Extra thick, durable. It definitely is somewhat hard and will take awhile to break in. My daughter did not want to do back handsprings on it because it is so hard. Otherwise a great mat for basic safe tumbling or exercise. We have pulled it outside many times for outdoor tumbling. Nice thick handles.
customer_reviews.author: BMac

customer_reviews.title: Reccomended
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter who does recreational gymnastics. She loves and it works great for her to practice. It's durable and easy to put up and down. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joni and Doug

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever & grest custoner service!
customer_reviews.text: My 6yr old and 2 yr old daughters love this mat & use it every single day! My daughter is in gymnastics & it has helped her to practice safely. Good quality & they are able to fold it up on their own. I had a minor issue with one of the handles and the company gave me wonderful options to take care of it. Love this mat & great customer service!! 😊 It's 4ft x 10ft & 2inches thick.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Great gymnastics mat!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! Beautiful blue/aqua color. The mat is easy to fold and light enough to carry inside or outside for tumbling. My daughter is a competition cheerleader and gymnast. We are very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christa Lee

customer_reviews.title: Quality mats
customer_reviews.text: Quality mat, plenty of padding for jiu jitsu. Will buy more for my garage gym.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Huge & Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband to practice his ninjutsu when it was on sale. It's way better than expected. Can see us using this for years to come for my daughter as well. Will be buying another at some point to connect to it.
customer_reviews.author: Life Among Wildflowers

customer_reviews.title: Grand Daughter Loves Gift
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed,lightweight and folds easily. Grand Daughter was surprised & very happy
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Stilwell

customer_reviews.title: I AM SO MAD THEY LOOKED GREAT AND THEN I NOTICED THAT THE STITCHING RIPS EASILY
customer_reviews.text: I AM SO MAD THEY LOOKED GREAT AND THEN I NOTICED THAT THE STITCHING RIPS EASILY. FOR $100 NOT WORTH IT. FIND ANOTHER SELLER.
customer_reviews.author: Amby

customer_reviews.title: Good size and daughter loves color!
customer_reviews.text: Nice mat, and thicker than I thought it would be, which is great for when my daughter practices her tumbling. She loved the pink color and the mat was a good size. My only negatives are that I wish the handles velcroed together, so the mat doesn’t fall open after I fold it back. Also, I have wood floors and it slides a lot. Wish it had something on the underside to help grip. It already has a Velcro which would be great if we were at a gym, but doesn’t help at home.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 12 year old cheerleader. Just the right thickness and still provides a little bounce
customer_reviews.author: Tracy H.

customer_reviews.title: To use this inside you need a fairly good size living room or plan on using it outside
customer_reviews.text: My daughter does competitive cheer. I purchased this item for her to have as a Christmas present. It is much bigger than I anticipated but that is my fault for not actually measuring how big it is! To use this inside you need a fairly good size living room or plan on using it outside. It is easy to transport with the handle and it is light enough that my 11 year old daughter can move it herself.
customer_reviews.author: RMM

customer_reviews.title: Easy to wipe off and keep clean.
customer_reviews.text: Our girls ages 11 and 6 love these mats. They use them all the time to practice their tumbling. Its all for fun! They fold up nice and can be tucked out of the way under the stairs or storage room.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Porter

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: As I hope you can see in the picture, the strip of material designed to velcro the mats together is not evenly manufactured. For at least half of the mat the velcro on the bottom is uncovered because the velcro on the other mat is too narrow in width. As a result, you feel raw velcro on your skin when you try to use the amt, which is uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Costa

customer_reviews.title: I feel it is a perfect balance of firmness and softness for practicing her gymnastics
customer_reviews.text: My kids use this mat nearly every day for practicing gymnastics or just for playing on and it has held up far beyond what I expected. I feel it is a perfect balance of firmness and softness for practicing her gymnastics.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Jo Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Versatile gym mat!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our child to practice gymnastics at home. She loves it and can easily fold and move on her own. It’s thick and has Velcro so you could attach more mats. I could see really anyone at any age getting a lot of use out of this...the dogs love lying on it too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size and quality
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. Firm, folds multiple ways for use doing bridge kick overs, backbends, stretches. Size is good for any age doing gymnastics. Plenty of room to do multiple tumble moves. Velcro on the sides to connect to another mat. Does not slide on hard wood floors. Easy to fold and carry. Not too heavy for a strong 8yr old to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Platkus

customer_reviews.title: ... product arrived earlier than expected and was shipped in great condition. The exterior material is much higher quality ...
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived earlier than expected and was shipped in great condition. The exterior material is much higher quality that I expected based on the price for the product. My daughter uses this to practice tumbling at home. The size is perfect for home use, yet still folds up nicely to be stored away. The mat feels sturdy and holds up to the use and my kids are able to move it around themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Trthompson01

customer_reviews.title: Quality product. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Our grandchildren love this mat. It is very well constructed and stands up to lots of little feet. Folds up neatly and even has a handle to transport easily from room to room.
customer_reviews.author: l breed

customer_reviews.title: Really light, but absorb impact well!
customer_reviews.text: My wife got these for me for some in-home training (Brazilian jiu jitsu). We've had them for about 8 months now, and they've been great! Super easy to put down or pack up. Surprisingly light, but absorb impact well. We like them enough that we bought 2 more slabs (we're up to 5 now) because we wanted some more square footage
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M Ries

customer_reviews.title: Safe Gymnastics
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old grand daughter was practicing gymnastics with no pad. Bought this for a birthday present. Couldnt be more happy. I ordered the 4 x 10. I was amazed at the quality. Velcro around the edges for easy storage and a handle on top for easy carrying. 2 inch pad perfect for application. Don't know how you can make a product like this for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than we expected
customer_reviews.text: This was even better than my 13 year old expected. The mat is excellent quality, perfect thickness and firmness.
customer_reviews.author: TRAVIS KITCHENS III

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy construction, Folds up for easy storage
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 6 year old daughter for Christmas. She was taking gymnastic classes and wanted to practice at home. The mat folds up nicely for storage when not in use. We've used the mat for about two years now and the construction has held up wonderfully. The carrying handles and Velcro latch are a plus as well.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Folds up very nicely and is made of good material
customer_reviews.text: Folds up very nicely and is made of good material. So far it hasn't scratched, ripped of torn and it sees regular use at home by 3 very energetic young gymnasts.
customer_reviews.author: Brasconian

customer_reviews.title: Good products our girls range in weight from 80 to ...
customer_reviews.text: Those mats have been holding up to a lot of exercise. I purchased these because the materials were thicker to withstand the punishment of Gymnastics. Good products our girls range in weight from 80 to 120 lbs. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Master

customer_reviews.title: Excellent exercise pads
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses these to practice aerial tumbling. Theses are well padded, easy to clean and folds up for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Martin A Empringham

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great. Love the handles and the longer length. Not as sturdy and thick as AAA brand but only a fraction of the price and soft enough for my girls to practice handsprings on and light enough for them to put away by themselves.
customer_reviews.author: BGardner

customer_reviews.title: ... granddaughter is really into gymnastics and this mat is great for safety reasons
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is really into gymnastics and this mat is great for safety reasons. The only problem we had was that one side of one of the handles came loose.
customer_reviews.author: B. Federman

customer_reviews.title: They love it and even the 2 year old loves it ...
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters go to gymnastics and I purchased this mat so they could practice at home. They love it and even the 2 year old loves it too. She tries to do everything her sister do. The mat is very well made and has enough padding. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary O

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This mat is a huge hit for my daughter. Got this months ago and it is still holding up!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality, and good cushion.
customer_reviews.text: This mat was exactly what I was hoping it would be. High quality, and just the right amount of cushion. Not too soft. I liked it so much I ordered a second one to connect to this one. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great gymnastic mat
customer_reviews.text: Great gymnastic mat. Easy to open and close, nice and thick but also soft. Great for workouts and tumbling.
customer_reviews.author: TwinMama0911

customer_reviews.title: Panel Mat, HIGHLY Recommended
customer_reviews.text: My kids Absolutely Love this. It’s light, easy to fold and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: ACC

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This was much nicer than i expected. The mat is thick and is perfect for my daughter to practice gymnastics at home. It takes up a good portion of our living room :-)
customer_reviews.author: R. Gariferro

customer_reviews.title: ... been using this for a year now and it's great for her to practice at home when we can't ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been using this for a year now and it's great for her to practice at home when we can't make it to the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Shani Fulton

customer_reviews.title: GREAT MAT, BETTER THAN EXPECTED!
customer_reviews.text: This mat is great, better than expected. It is thick, arrived fast and in great shape...also a pretty blue and nicer than the picture. Folds up easy and my kids love this, they sometimes keep it folded and laying down to do jumps off of or from the couch onto...keeps them busy and folds so not a bother to store. It also does not have a bad smell...that is important for me having my kids on it.
customer_reviews.author: cece

customer_reviews.title: Love these mats.
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 mats and hooked them together to do physical therapy on. Seam to be holding up so far after 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Ayars

customer_reviews.title: Best on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Velcro on all ends for attaching and grandson loves it for gymnastics practice and tumbling.
customer_reviews.author: C.B.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our girls to practice in our home. Folds easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter's love having this to practice their gymnastics
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's love having this to practice their gymnastics. Seems very durable as well. It's been used for sleep overs. At home and away. They use it to play and then sleep on top of it with their sleeping bags. It's also been at a talent show where kids were using it with tennis shoes on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the seams do not last long at all!!
customer_reviews.text: The mat is nice for the price but did not hold up. the spot where the handles are sewn on busted at the seam in the first week. We have had it almost a year now and almost all the seams are busted and falling apart. I emailed pictures right after Christmas about the issues and was not offered a refund or exchane.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Just what our daughter needed
customer_reviews.text: This mat is very good! My kids love it! My wife works out on it too. It has Velcro on the bottom to link other mats to it but I found it works well to stick to the carpet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Best Choice Products 10x4ft 4-Panel Foam Folding Exercise Gym Mat for Gymnastics, Aerobics, Yoga w/Handles
product_meta.description: This 10’ gym mat is ready to get physical and help you channel your inner athlete. Designed with non-absorbent PU leather, this mat is perfect for whatever gets you moving: tumbling, yoga, aerobics, Pilates, martial arts, dance, and more! Whether you’re perfecting your tumbling or practicing your balance with a handstand, this gym mat’s ready to help you keep fit. SPECIFICATIONS: Expanded Dimensions: 10’(L) x 4’(W) x 2”(thick); Folded Dimensions: 48”(L) x 10”(W) x 10”(H); Weight: 14.95 lbs.; Color: Pink/Black; Material: PU Leather, High-Density EPE Foam; No assembly required.
feature_bullets: FOAM SUPPORT: A safe surface for practice, this mat is crafted with 2 inches of thick high-density EPE foam to provide comfort and support in the event of a hard fall
DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: Made with a non-absorbent faux leather cover and heavy duty stitching for lasting quality
EASY-STORAGE: Mat features carrying handles for easy transportation and a folding, 4-panel design that allows for quick, convenient storage
COMPATIBLE DESIGN: Self fasteners on the edges allow you to pair this mat with others for a larger practice area

MULTIFUNCTIONAL: A mat for every occasion, the perfect companion for yoga, dancing, gymnastics and much more; OVERALL DIMENSIONS: (Unfolded) 120"(L) x 48"(W) x 2"(Thick); (Folded) 48"(L) x 10"(W) x 10"(H)

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
